columns.name: consignee
columns.description: Reference to the Organization that fulfills the role of the consignee; for a LiveAnimalsEpermit it has to include complete name and address (box 3)

columns.name: consignments
columns.description: Reference to the pieces and properties linked to the Permit (box 7 to 12)

columns.name: signatures
columns.description: List of all the signatures of the Epermit (applicant box 4; issuing authority box 6; issuer box 13 and examining authority box 14)

columns.name: transactionPurposeCode
columns.description: Code indicating the purpose of the transaction (box 5a)

columns.name: transportContractTypeCode
columns.description: Code specifying the transport document name (box 15)

columns.name: copyIndicator
columns.description: Indicates if the permit is a copy (true) or an original (false) (box 1)

columns.name: epermitNumber
columns.description: The original number is a unique number allocated to each document by the relevant Management Authority. (box 1)

columns.name: transactionPurpose
columns.description: Purpose of the transaction in free text (box 5a)

columns.name: transportContractId
columns.description: Reference to the Air Waybill or other transport contract document (box 15)

columns.name: validFrom
columns.description: Validity start date based on usage context

columns.name: validUntil
columns.description: Validity end date (date of expiry) based on usage context

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
